sense.def:
To talk
pomeni pripovedovati stvari nekomu drugemu.

seg.quote: He was the only one in the family she could talk to.
I must have a long talk with him.
There was a lot of talk about his divorce.

sense.def:
To talk politics or sport
pomeni govoriti na primer o politiki ali športu.

seg.quote: Let's talk a little business, shall we?

sense.def:
To talk on or about something
pomeni imeti neuraden govor o nečem.

seg.quote: I talked yesterday about the history of the project.
I used to give the staff a talk on psychology every week.

sense.def:
Talks
so uradni pogovori, zlasti med dvema državama ali dvema stranema v sporu.

Z izrazom
talking of
uvedemo novo témo pogovora, ki je nekako povezana s tistim, kar smo pravkar omenili.

seg.quote: Talking of girls, has anyone seen Sylvia Wicks recently?

sense.def:
To talk down to someone
pomeni z nekom govoriti na način, ki kaže, da mislimo, da smo pametnejši ali pomembnejši od njega.

To talk someone into doing something
pomeni prepričati nekoga, da nekaj naredi.

seg.quote: She talked me into taking a week's holiday.

sense.def:
To talk someone out of doing something
pomeni prepričati nekoga, da nečesa ne naredi.

seg.quote: He tried to talk me out of buying such a big car.

sense.def:
To talk something over
pomeni nekaj pretresti v pogovoru z drugimi.

seg.quote: I agreed to go home and talk things over with my father.
